function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complexity in factoring natural birth and death rates of a population","Impact":"Inaccurate epidemic persistence prediction leading to ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Incorporate accurate birth and death rate data in epidemic modeling","Technologies":"Epidemic modeling software","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Government health agencies"},{"Description":"Complexity in factoring spatial movement of populations","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease spread leading to ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Incorporate population movement data into disease spread models","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, GPS tracking","People":"Public health authorities, urban planners","Owner":"Data scientists, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Compartmentalization complexity in epidemic models","Impact":"Ineffective response to specific disease characteristics leading to uncontrolled outbreaks","Mitigation":"Include specific compartments for different disease types in epidemic models","Technologies":"Epidemic modeling software, disease surveillance systems","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health research institutions"}]}
